title: Prey is the Bioshock We Missed This Gen | The Joy of Gaming
description:
Join our YouTube Membership program for Early Access to videos, badges, emojis, bonus content and more. ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqg5FCR7NrpvlBWMXdt-5Vg/join

The Joy of Gaming returns this week with a look at Prey and how it filled the void left by not having a new Bioshock game this generation.
